en-US.title: Decision Coin
en-US.subtitle: Flip a coin to decide
en-US.description:
Decision Coin is a simple, elegant coin-flipping app that helps you make decisions. Features include:

- Classic Heads/Tails mode
- Custom A/B mode with your own labels
- Realistic coin flip animation
- Haptic feedback
- Flip history tracking
- Gesture controls (flick up to flip, shake to reset)

Perfect for making quick decisions, settling debates, or just having fun!
